abilities.name: mortal will
abilities.description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

abilities.name: comet spear
abilities.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

abilities.name: shield vault
abilities.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.

abilities.name: aegis assault
abilities.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.

abilities.name: grand starfall
abilities.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.
